bullets.text: Launched flagship product feature that increased user engagement by 35% and drove $2M in annual recurring revenue
Led cross-functional team of 12 (engineering, design, marketing) to deliver product on time and 10% under budget
Conducted 50+ customer discovery interviews, synthesizing insights into product roadmap that reduced churn by 25%
Defined and tracked OKRs across 3 product lines, improving feature adoption by 40% through data-driven prioritization
Managed product backlog of 200+ items, maintaining stakeholder alignment through weekly sprint reviews and quarterly planning
